name: restglue
description: multi-api restful client (javascript) with glue, using superagent & promises (lightweight, no buildchain needed)

scripts.builddev: cat node_modules/superagent-dist/superagent.js src/index.js > dist/restglue.js && cat dist/restglue.js > dist/restglue.min.js
scripts.build: cat node_modules/superagent-dist/superagent.js src/index.js > dist/restglue.js && minify dist/restglue.js > dist/restglue.min.js

author: coderofsalvation
